metadata.title: CVE-2020-28241 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
libmaxminddb before 1.4.3 has a heap-based buffer over-read indump_entry_data_list in maxminddb.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28241` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmaxminddb0 - 1.4.2-0ubuntu2
mmdb-bin - 1.4.2-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmaxminddb package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-0ubuntu2').
